java/liquibase/database/sql/InsertStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 import java.util.Date;
00007 import java.util.HashMap;
00008 import java.util.Map;
00009 
00010 public class InsertStatement implements SqlStatement {
00011     private String schemaName;
00012     private String tableName;
00013     private Map<String, Object> newColumnValues = new HashMap<String, Object>();
00014 
00015     public InsertStatement(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00016         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00017         this.tableName = tableName;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public String getSchemaName() {
00021         return schemaName;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getTableName() {
00025         return tableName;
00026     }
00027 
00028     public InsertStatement addColumnValue(String columnName, Object newValue) {
00029         newColumnValues.put(columnName, newValue);
00030 
00031         return this;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public Object getColumnValue(String columnName) {
00035         return newColumnValues.get(columnName);
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00039         if (getSchemaName() != null && !database.supportsSchemas()) {
00040             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support schemas", this, database);
00041         }
00042         StringBuffer sql = new StringBuffer("INSERT INTO " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " (");
00043         for (String column : newColumnValues.keySet()) {
00044             sql.append(column).append(", ");
00045         }
00046         sql.deleteCharAt(sql.lastIndexOf(" "));
00047         sql.deleteCharAt(sql.lastIndexOf(","));
00048 
00049         sql.append(") VALUES (");
00050 
00051         for (String column : newColumnValues.keySet()) {
00052             Object newValue = newColumnValues.get(column);
00053             if (newValue == null) {
00054                 sql.append("NULL");
00055             } else if (newValue instanceof String && database.shouldQuoteValue(((String) newValue))) {
00056                 sql.append("'").append(database.escapeStringForDatabase((String) newValue)).append("'");
00057             } else if (newValue instanceof Date) {
00058                 sql.append(database.getDateLiteral(((Date) newValue)));
00059             } else if (newValue instanceof Boolean) {
00060                 if (((Boolean) newValue)) {
00061                     sql.append(database.getTrueBooleanValue());
00062                 } else {
00063                     sql.append(database.getFalseBooleanValue());
00064                 }
00065             } else {
00066                 sql.append(newValue);
00067             }
00068             sql.append(", ");
00069         }
00070 
00071         sql.deleteCharAt(sql.lastIndexOf(" "));
00072         sql.deleteCharAt(sql.lastIndexOf(","));
00073 
00074         sql.append(")");
00075         return sql.toString();
00076     }
00077 
00078     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00079         return ";";
00080     }
00081 
00082     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00083         return true;
00084     }
00085 }
